description: This is a CSS stylesheet for styling the user interface of a tic-tac-toe game, defining visual themes, layout, and various UI elements.

classes.name: tic-container
classes.description: Wrapper for the tic-tac-toe game surface, centering the content vertically and horizontally.

classes.name: tic-game-surface
classes.description: Styling for the main game surface, including background, padding, and shadow effects.

classes.name: tic-title
classes.description: Styling for the game title with specific font size, weight, and color.

classes.name: tic-status
classes.description: Styling for displaying the current game status, such as ongoing or completed.

classes.name: tic-board
classes.description: Grid layout styling for the tic-tac-toe board, setting rows and columns.

classes.name: tic-square
classes.description: Defines the appearance of each square in the tic-tac-toe grid, including hover and focus states.

classes.name: tic-reset-btn
classes.description: Styling for the reset button to restart the game, including interactions.
